definition: having the color of a canary, any of several small Old World finches
details:
adjective
- having the color of a canary
= synonyms: canary-yellow
noun
- any of several small Old World finches
= synonyms: canary bird
- a moderate yellow with a greenish tinge
= synonyms: canary yellow
- a female singer
= synonyms: soprano
- someone acting as an informer or decoy for the police
= synonyms: sneaker, stool pigeon, fink, snitch, snitcher, stoolpigeon, stoolie, sneak
